content.text: Published #ssb-patchwork to the #aur! Btw, I'm not sure whether it's worth putting more effort into signing the releases, but I'd love to have the sha512sum included for `https://github.com/ssbc/patchwork/archive/v${pkgver}.tar.gz` as well so others don't just have to take my word for it. Thanks for the release! :raised_hands:
